'''Minecraft: Guide to the Nether & End''' is a guide that contains various tips on how to get to, survive in, and explore [[the Nether]] and [[the End]].

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|Survival is difficult in the perilous Nether and End dimensions, and you'll need to up your game if you want to make it back to the Overworld.

The official '''''Minecraft: Guide to the Nether & the End''''' will teach you how to navigate the alien terrain, battle the native mobs and find rare blocks and items.

With insider info and tips from the experts at Mojang, this is the definitive guide to survival in the Nether and the End.}}
